author: msquadrat
msg: Clean up the test for protocol version 1.0 so that it works with Perl 5.005 (which doesn't support SEEK_SET and 'use IO::Socket::INET').

author: msquadrat
msg: The old Pod::Usage from Perl 5.005_03 is buggy, we need at least v1.10. And don't parse the Makefile.PL in the directory created by 'make dist*' -- it's enough to answer those questions once.

author: msquadrat
msg: bug 2192: make reloading via SIGHUP actually work when daemonized

author: msquadrat
msg: Pod::Usage 1.0, shipped with Perl 5.005_03, has a weird dependency on Pod::Text 2.0 which never ever existed. The next working version seems to be 1.10, so that's the minimum we require (Perl 5.6.1 ships 1.13).

author: jmason
msg: bug 2006: spamc returnes 0 when stdout is closed, fixed
